axes.name: Advanced Accelerator Design Help
axes.question: Does this research materially help design or optimize high-end AI accelerators or other chips that might be export-controlled?

axes.name: Export-Control Circumvention Potential
axes.question: Does this research help achieve near-frontier performance at older nodes / circumvent compute or export thresholds?

axes.name: Military / Intelligence Applications
axes.question: Is it aimed at, or obviously applicable to, defense, surveillance, SIGINT, or weapons systems?

axes.name: Expertise-Reduction / Democratization
axes.question: Does it significantly lower the expertise needed to design or tape-out advanced chips (e.g., novice-friendly EDA copilots, templates, or automated flows)?

axes.name: Pathogen Enhancement Potential
axes.question: Does this research provide methods to enhance pathogen transmissibility, virulence, or resistance to countermeasures?

axes.name: Dual-Use Biological Techniques
axes.question: Does this research describe techniques (gene editing, synthetic biology, gain-of-function) that could be misused to create biological threats?

axes.name: Biosecurity / Bioweapon Relevance
axes.question: Is it aimed at, or obviously applicable to, biological weapons development, bioterrorism, or circumventing biosecurity measures?

axes.name: Accessibility of Dangerous Knowledge
axes.question: Does it significantly lower the expertise or resources needed to recreate dangerous biological agents or processes?

axes.name: Offensive Capability Enhancement
axes.question: Does this research provide novel attack methods, exploits, or tools that could be used for malicious cyber operations?

axes.name: Critical Infrastructure Risk
axes.question: Does this research reveal vulnerabilities or attack vectors targeting critical infrastructure (power, finance, healthcare, etc.)?

axes.name: State-Level Cyber Operations
axes.question: Is it aimed at, or obviously applicable to, nation-state cyber warfare, mass surveillance, or intelligence operations?

axes.name: Attack Democratization
axes.question: Does it significantly lower the expertise needed to conduct sophisticated cyber attacks or develop malware?

axes.name: Harmful Content Generation
axes.question: Does this research enable generation of harmful content (deepfakes, disinformation, CSAM, etc.) at scale?

axes.name: Autonomous Weapons Applicability
axes.question: Does this research advance capabilities directly applicable to autonomous weapons or lethal autonomous systems?

axes.name: Mass Surveillance Enhancement
axes.question: Is it aimed at, or obviously applicable to, mass surveillance, social control, or authoritarian monitoring systems?

axes.name: Safety Bypass / Jailbreaking
axes.question: Does it provide methods to bypass AI safety measures, alignment techniques, or content moderation systems?

axes.name: Chemical Weapons Relevance
axes.question: Does this research provide synthesis routes, precursors, or methods applicable to chemical weapons or toxic agents?

axes.name: Explosive / Energetic Materials
axes.question: Does this research advance the synthesis or optimization of explosives, propellants, or energetic materials?

axes.name: Controlled Substance Synthesis
axes.question: Does it provide methods for synthesizing controlled substances, drugs of abuse, or their precursors?

axes.name: Democratization of Dangerous Synthesis
axes.question: Does it significantly lower the expertise or equipment needed to synthesize dangerous chemicals?

axes.name: Weapons Design Assistance
axes.question: Does this research provide information that could materially assist in nuclear weapons design or optimization?

axes.name: Enrichment / Proliferation Risk
axes.question: Does this research advance uranium enrichment, plutonium production, or other proliferation-sensitive technologies?

axes.name: Radiological Dispersal Devices
axes.question: Is it applicable to the development of radiological dispersal devices (dirty bombs) or similar threats?

axes.name: Export Control Circumvention
axes.question: Does it help circumvent nuclear export controls or safeguards monitoring?
